solution_line_template: Each day it needs to consume {weekly_blood_needed_gallons}/{days_per_week}=<<{weekly_blood_needed_gallons}/{days_per_week}={daily_blood_needed_gallons}>>{daily_blood_needed_gallons} gallon of blood
So he needs to suck blood from {daily_pints_required}/{pints_per_person}=<<{daily_pints_required}/{pints_per_person}={people_per_day}>>{people_per_day} people per day
